name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
en.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} dans l'un des cotés d'une pool stable (single side LP) sur [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Les récompenses sont récoltées, réparties entre les paires, vendues pour plus de {{token}}, et redéposé dans la stratégie.

es.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
es.description: Suministra {{token}} como la mitad de un proveedor de liquidez para un grupo de estables en [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Las recompensas se cosechan, se dividen entre los pares, se venden por más {{token}} y se vuelven a depositar en la estrategia.

de.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
de.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

el.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
el.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
tr.description: [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi)'de Sabit Havuz için birleştirilmiş likidite sağlayıcısının yarısı olarak {{token}} sağlar. Ödüller toplanır, çiftler arasında bölünür, daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır ve stratejiye geri yatırılır.

vi.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 作为一半的流动性放入 [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) 的稳定池，收获奖励分配给流动性对后，卖掉换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
hi.description: [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi) पर एक स्थिर पूल के लिए जॉइन लिक्विडिटी प्रदाता के रूप में {{token}} की आपूर्ति करता है। पुरस्कारों को काटा जाता है, जोड़ियों के बीच विभाजित किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} में बेचा जाता है, और वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।

ja.description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.
